00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "common_checker.hpp"
00025 #include "../parameter.hpp"
00026 #include "../parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00027 #include "../argument_caster.hpp"
00028 
00029 #include <boost/assign.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/filesystem/operations.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/asio/ip/address_v4.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/asio/ip/address_v6.hpp>
00033 
00036 namespace clpp {
00037 
00040 namespace detail {
00041 
00042 using namespace boost::assign;
00043 
00044 void check_ipv4_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00045     try {
00046         boost::asio::ip::address_v4 a( boost::asio::ip::address_v4::from_string( address ) );
00047     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00048         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00049                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00050                                           + " has invalid IPv4 value '" + address + "'!";
00051         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void check_ipv6_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00056     try {
00057         boost::asio::ip::address_v6 a( boost::asio::ip::address_v6::from_string( address ) );
00058     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00059         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00060                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00061                                           + " has invalid IPv6 value '" + address + "'!";
00062         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void check_ip_validity( const std::string& address, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00067     try {
00068         check_ipv4_validity( address, parameter_name );
00069     } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00070         try {
00071             check_ipv6_validity( address, parameter_name );
00072         } catch ( const std::exception& /* exc */ ) {
00073             const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00074                                               + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00075                                               + " has invalid value '" + address + "' (not IPv4, not IPv6)!";
00076             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00077         }
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void check_path_existence( const std::string& path, const std::string& parameter_name ) {
00082     if ( !boost::filesystem::exists( path ) ) {
00083         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00084                                           + "Semantic error: parameter '" + parameter_name + "'" 
00085                                           + " has invalid path value '" + path + "' (no such path)!";
00086         throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00087     } else {}
00088 }
00089 
00090 typedef common_checker< parameters, parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00091 
00096 class values_semantic_checker : public checker {
00097     typedef boost::function< void ( const std::string& /* arg */
00098                                     , const std::string& /* parameter name */ ) >
00099             check_func;
00100 
00101     typedef std::map
00102                 < 
00103                     const value_semantic
00104                     , const check_func
00105                 >
00106             checkers;
00107 public:
00108     values_semantic_checker( const parameters&                  registered_parameters
00109                              , const parameter_parts_extractor& extractor
00110                              , const std::string&               name_value_separator ) :
00111             checker( registered_parameters, extractor, name_value_separator ) {
00112         insert( semantic_checkers )( path, check_path_existence )
00113                                    ( ipv4, check_ipv4_validity )
00114                                    ( ipv6, check_ipv6_validity )
00115                                    ( ip,   check_ip_validity )
00116                                    ;
00117     }
00118 private:
00119     checkers semantic_checkers;
00120     argument_caster caster;
00121 public:
00122     void check( const str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00123         str_storage all_names = collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters(); 
00124         check_semantic_of_inputed_values( inputed_parameters, all_names );
00125         check_semantic_of_default_values( all_names ); 
00126     }
00127 private:
00128     str_storage collect_names_of_all_registered_parameters() const {
00129         str_storage all_names;
00130         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00131             all_names += registered_parameter.short_name;
00132         }
00133         return all_names;
00134     }
00135     
00136     void check_semantic_of_inputed_values( const str_storage& inputed_parameters
00137                                            , str_storage& all_names ) const {
00138         BOOST_FOREACH ( const std::string& inputed_parameter, inputed_parameters ) {
00139             if ( this_is_parameter_with_value( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00140                 const std::string name  = extractor.extract_name_from( inputed_parameter );
00141                 const std::string value = extractor.extract_value_from( inputed_parameter );
00142                 parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00143                                                    , registered_parameters.end()
00144                                                    , name );
00145                 if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00146                     check_semantic_of_inputed_value( *it, value );
00147                     delete_element( all_names, name );
00148                 } else {}
00149             } else {}
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     bool this_is_parameter_with_value( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00154         return boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator );
00155     }
00156     
00157     void check_semantic_of_inputed_value( const parameter& registered_parameter
00158                                           , const std::string& value ) const {
00159         const value_semantic semantic = registered_parameter.semantic;
00160         if ( no_semantic != semantic ) {
00161             const std::string name = registered_parameter.short_name;
00162             semantic_checkers.at( semantic )( value, name );
00163         } else {}
00164     }
00165 private:
00166     void check_semantic_of_default_values( const str_storage& all_names ) const {
00167         BOOST_FOREACH ( const parameter& registered_parameter, registered_parameters ) {
00168             str_const_it it = std::find( all_names.begin()
00169                                          , all_names.end()
00170                                          , registered_parameter.short_name );
00171             if ( all_names.end() != it ) {
00172                 check_semantic_of_default_value( registered_parameter );    
00173             } else {}
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177     void check_semantic_of_default_value( const parameter& registered_parameter ) const {
00178         const value_semantic semantic = registered_parameter.semantic;
00179         if ( need_to_check_semantic( registered_parameter, semantic ) ) {
00180             s_arg_p p = boost::any_cast< s_arg_p >( registered_parameter.for_arg );
00181             semantic_checkers.at( registered_parameter.semantic )( p->default_value, registered_parameter.short_name );
00182         } else {}
00183     }
00184 
00185     bool need_to_check_semantic( const parameter& registered_parameter
00186                                  , const value_semantic& semantic ) const {
00187         return registered_parameter.has_default_value() 
00188                && ( no_semantic != semantic )
00189                && caster.argument_must_be_string( registered_parameter )
00190                ;
00191     }
00192 };
00193 
00194 } // namespace detail
00195 } // namespace clpp
00196 
00197 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_VALUES_SEMANTIC_HPP
